si.title: Raziskovalno delo
si.description: Projekt so raziskave in implementacija programskega paketa za R, ki uporabnikom omogoča uporabo statističnih modelov, ki so paralelizirani na grafičnih procesnih enotah. V okviru tega projekta bomo implementirali ogrodje in en model - model s posplošeno logistično funcijo, ki se uporablja kot jedro orodja za klinične simulacije v konzorciju Critical path za Parkinsonovo bolezen.

en.title: Hypercomputing for Critical Path Parkinsons Consortium
en.description: This project is the research and implementation of a software package for R that allows the user to run statistical models that are parallelized on a graphical processing unit. As part of this project, we will implement the framework and a model - the generalized logistic based model that is being used as the underlying model for the Critical path for Parkinsons clinical trial simulation tool.
